name: Pet Vet: Marine Patrol
overview: Cute animals need your help in My Vet Practice - SOS by the Ocean! Rescue in northern Canada injured animals from beaches and islands to be treated at the rescue center. Take care of orcas, seals, dolphins, baby polar bears and many other animals: pet, feed and treat your little friends and become a really good vet over time! Here you will experience realistic tasks and exciting adventures in a lifelike environment!
